attributes.action: re-unite Mr and Mrs Appiah with their children
attributes.additional_details:
Mr and Mrs Appiah came from Ghane to this country as visitors on visa's, their children on visa's too, the whole family were refused visa's to stay, but the children were taken in to care by Leeds City Council and it would appear as if the Government wishes to commit Genocide by sending the parents home to Ghana and keeping the children here under 'care'.

Please re-unite Mr and Mrs Appiah with their children.
